file_insights.changes: Added error handling to the audit log data loading process
key_additions: Imported useToast hook from ToastProvider component
Integrated showError function from toast hook
Replaced console.error with user-facing error notification

patterns_discovered.description: Replace console.error logging with user-visible toast messages for API failures
patterns_discovered.context: Data loading operations in page components
patterns_discovered.benefit: Users receive immediate feedback about operation failures instead of silent failures

patterns_discovered.description: Centralized error notification through useToast hook from ToastProvider
patterns_discovered.benefit: Consistent error messaging across the application

patterns_discovered.description: Single line change in catch block provides user-visible feedback
patterns_discovered.benefit: Quick, non-breaking changes that enhance UX

gotchas_discovered.description: User-facing toast messages replace console.error but developers may want both for debugging
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Could log to console AND show toast for comprehensive error tracking

gotchas_discovered.description: Generic error message 'Please try again' may not help users understand what went wrong
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Consider passing error details to showError or using more specific messages based on error type

approach_outcome.strategy: Direct integration of existing error handling pattern
approach_outcome.execution: Single attempt successfully implemented the error handling
approach_outcome.key_decision: Leveraged existing ToastProvider infrastructure rather than creating new error handling mechanism
approach_outcome.result: Improved user experience through consistent error notifications

recommendations.suggestion: Consider adding error logging to backend/monitoring system while showing toast to user
recommendations.rationale: Users see friendly message while developers can track errors for debugging

recommendations.suggestion: Differentiate error messages based on error type (network, server, validation)
recommendations.rationale: More helpful messaging enables users to understand and potentially resolve issues

recommendations.suggestion: Apply same error handling pattern to other data loading operations in the application
recommendations.rationale: Consistent error handling across all pages provides predictable user experience

recommendations.suggestion: Add unit tests for error scenarios to verify toast notification is called
recommendations.rationale: Ensures error handling continues to work as intended during future refactoring
